<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104421</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202679</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dynamic dialect: Horace Kephart and our Southern Highlanders</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dynamischer Dialekt: Horace Kephart und 
unsere südlichen Highlanders</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dialecte dynamique : Horace Kephart et nos 
montagnards méridionaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dialect dinâmico: Horace Kephart e nossos 
highlanders do sul</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dialetto dinamico: Horace Kephart ed i 
nostri highlanders del sud</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυναμική διάλεκτος: Οράτιος Kephart και νότια
highlanders μας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dialecto dinámico: Horace Kephart y 
nuestros montañeses meridionales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will read an excerpt from Horace Kephart's Our Southern Highlanders and explore how language and dialect have changed over the years.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer lesen ein Excerpt von Horace 
Kepharts unseren südlichen Highlanders und erforschen, wie Sprache 
und Dialekt über den Jahren geändert haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants liront un extrait de nos 
montagnards méridionaux de Horace Kephart et exploreront comment le 
langage et le dialecte ont changé au cours des années.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes lerão um excerpt de nossos 
highlanders do sul de Horace Kephart e explorarão como a língua e o 
dialect mudaram sobre os anos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi leggeranno un brano dai nostri 
highlanders del sud di Horace Kephart ed esploreranno come il 
linguaggio ed il dialetto sono cambiato nel corso degli anni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα διαβάσουν ένα απόσπασμα από νότια 
highlanders του Ορατίου μας Kephart's και θα εξερευνήσουν πώς
η γλώσσα και η διάλεκτος έχουν αλλάξει κατά τη διάρκεια των 
ετών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes leerán un extracto de nuestros 
montañeses meridionales de Horace Kephart y explorarán cómo el 
lenguaje y el dialecto han cambiado sobre los años.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

              <value>author</value>

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

FN:OERCommons

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104421</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/dynamic-dialect-horace-kephart-and-our-southern-highlanders</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
